title: Bug 7581 - ComboBoxCellEditor not sizing correctly in property sheet
description: From ECJoe Winchester <JoeWin@us.ibm.com>: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet is not sizing correctly.
OB: When using the ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet, the size of the editor is not correct.
EB: The ComboBoxCellEditor in the property sheet should size properly.
SR:
1. Open the property sheet.
2. Edit a property with the ComboBoxCellEditor.
3. Observe that the size of the editor is not correct.
